properties.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 1 at 6:01PM MST until February 2 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect on Sunday from Noon to
6PM MST for gusty winds, low humidity and dry fuels, for fire
weather zones 233 and 237 which includes eastern Las Animas and
Baca Counties...

* Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 233 and 237.

* Winds...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph.

* Relative Humidity...5 to 10 percent.

* Impacts...Conditions may be favorable for the rapid ignition,
growth and spread of fires.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can
contribute to extreme fire behavior.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS, FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 233 AND 237
